Reference

Teal Core Functions

These are the main functions needed to build a teal app.

init()

Create the Server and UI Function For the Shiny App

module()

Create a module with a new shiny page

modules()

Create a collection of module and modules object

root_modules()

Create the root modules container

Reproducibility

Functions allowing teal output reproducibility.

cdisc_data()

Data input for teal app

cdisc_dataset()

Data input for teal app

get_code()

Get code

Teal Filtering and Selecting

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

add_no_selected_choices()

Add empty choice to choices selected

choices_labeled()

Set "<choice>:<label>" type of Names

choices_selected()

Choices function

data_extract_spec()

Data Extract input for teal modules

filter_spec()

filter spec

get_variable_labels()

Function that extract column labels from CDISC dataset

is.choices_selected()

Check if an object is a choices_selected class.

select_spec()

Column selection input specification

value_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variable values basing on other variable values

variable_choices()

Wrapper on choices_labeled to label variables basing on existing labels in data

Teal modules UI

Functions used to filter observations and select variables from dataset.

optionalSelectInput()

Hide, Show Label only or display a pickerInput

optionalSliderInput()

if min or max are NA then the slider widget will be hidden

optionalSliderInputValMinMax()

For teal modules we parameterize an optionalSliderInput with one argument value_min_max

updateOptionalSelectInput()

Update optionalSelectInput

Delayed Data Constructors

For creating delayed data objects.

cdisc_data_file()

Load cdisc_data object from a file

cdisc_dataset_file()

Load CDISC RelationalDataset object from a file

relational_dataset_connector() relational_dataset_connector_file() rcd_dataset_connector() rds_dataset_connector() script_dataset_connector() code_dataset_connector() rice_dataset_connector() teradata_dataset_connector() csv_dataset_connector() rds_cdisc_dataset_connector() rcd_cdisc_dataset_connector() rice_cdisc_dataset_connector() script_cdisc_dataset_connector() code_cdisc_dataset_connector() teradata_cdisc_dataset_connector() csv_cdisc_dataset_connector() fun_dataset_connector() fun_cdisc_dataset_connector()

Create a new RelationalDatasetConnector object

relational_dataset_file()

Load RelationalDataset object from a file

rcd_connection()

Open connection to random.cdisc.data

rcd_data()

RelationalDataConnector connector for random.cdisc.data

rice_connection()

Open connection to rice

rice_data()

Data connector for RICE

teradata_connection()

Open connection to Teradata

teradata_data()

RelationalDataConnector connector for TERADATA

as_relational() as_cdisc_relational()

Convert a Raw<...> object to a Relational<...> object

raw_dataset()

Constructor for RawDataset object

named_dataset()

Constructor for NamedDataset class

relational_dataset()

Create RelationalDataset object

raw_dataset_connector()

Create RawDatasetConnector object

named_dataset_connector()

Create a new NamedDatasetConnector object

teal_data()

Teal data

teal_data_file()

Load RelationalData object from a file

Delayed Data Functions

For loading and modifying delayed data objects.

callable_code()

Create CallableCode object

callable_function()

Create CallableFunction object

get_cdisc_keys()

Function that returns the default keys for a CDISC dataset by name

get_dataname()

S3 method for getting a dataname(s) of (RelationalDataConnector, (RelationalDatasetConnector or NamedDataset) R6 object

get_dataset()

Get dataset from DatasetConnector

get_dataset_label()

S3 method for getting a label of (RelationalDatasetConnector or NamedDataset) R6 object

get_datasets()

Get a RelationalDataset objects.

get_raw_data()

Retrieve raw data

is_pulled()

Is pulled

load_dataset()

Load data from connection

load_datasets()

Load datasets

mutate_data()

Mutate data by code

mutate_dataset()

Mutate dataset by code

resolve_delayed()

Resolve delayed inputs by evaluating the code within the provided datasets

resolve_delayed_expr()

Resolve expression after delayed data are loaded

set_args()

Set arguments of a CallableFunction

Helpers

Other useful functions for users and developers.

bookmarkableShinyApp()

Make a Shiny UI function bookmarkable

data_label()

Get dataset label attribute

dataset()

Data input for teal app

dataset_file()

Load RelationalDataset object from a file

default_filter()

Refer to the default filter state

get_labels()

Function that extract labels from CDISC dataset

keys()

Function that returns a keys object

log_app_usage()

Teal Application Usage Logging.

no_selected_as_NULL()

Check select choices for no choice made

read_script()

Read .R file into character

run_js_files()

Run JS file from /inst/js/ package directory

split_by_sep()

Split by separator

stop_shiny()

Stop app.R evaluation with a Jumbotron Shiny App

For Developers

R6 Classes

Abstract and concrete classes used to build teal functionality.

FilteredData

Class to encapsulate filtered datasets

Callable

A Callable class of objects

CallableCode

A CallableCode class of objects

CallableFunction

A CallableFunction class of objects

CodeClass

Code Class

RawDataset

R6 Class representing a raw data set

NamedDataset

R6 Class representing a dataset including code

RelationalDataset

R6 Class representing a dataset including keys

DataConnection

A DataConnection class of objects

RawDatasetConnector

A RawDatasetConnector class of objects

NamedDatasetConnector

A NamedDatasetConnector class of objects

RelationalDatasetConnector

A RelationalDatasetConnector class of objects

RelationalDataCollection

RelationalDataCollection class

RelationalDataConnector

Manage multiple and RelationalDatasetConnector of the same type.

RelationalData

Manage multiple RelationalDataConnector, RelationalDatasetConnector and RelationalDataset objects.

Unexported Functions

These functions are useful for teal developers.

bookmark_module()

Bookmarking module

check_foreign_keys()

Utility function to check if foreign keys are existing in parent dataset

check_in_subset()

Check that one set is a subset of another

check_pkg_quietly()

Check if package can be loaded

check_setequal()

Check that two sets are equal and informative error message otherwise

code_exclude()

Exclude from code

code_from_script()

Get code from script

debug_browser_module()

Module that calls browser() on button click

enclosed_with()

Get code enclosed within

enclosed_with_dataname()

Get code enclosed within

execute_in_next_cycle()

Execute the expression in the next reactive cycle

extract_choices_labels()

Extract labels from choices basing on attributes and names

extract_raw_choices()

Extract raw values from choices

filter_calls_module()

Dummy module to show the filter calls generated by the right encoding panel

filter_state_to_str()

Print the state in a nice format

find_source_code()

Finds lines of code with source call

get_code_single()

Get code

get_dummy_cdisc_data()

Get dummy CDISC data

get_dummy_datasets()

Get a dummy datasets object with ADSL data, useful in the examples

get_dummy_filter()

Get dummy filter states to apply initially

get_dummy_modules()

Get dummy modules

get_filter_vars()

Get filter variable names that are currently active

handle_active_datanames()

When active_datanames is "all", sets them to all datanames otherwise, it makes sure that it is a subset of the available datanames

include_css_files()

Include CSS files from /inst/css/ package directory to application header

include_js_files()

Include JS files from /inst/js/ package directory to application header

include_source_code()

Includes source in preprocessing code lines

include_teal_css_js()

Code to include teal CSS and Javascript files

label_to_id()

Turn a label into a valid html id, prefix a string

list_adsl_first()

Move ADSL to the first index in a vector

modules_depth()

Get module depth

picker_options()

Create choicesOpt for pickerInput

picker_options_content()

Optional content for optionalSelectInput

predefined_filters_module()

Add predefined filters with a button click

pretty_code_string()

Format a vector of code into a string

reset_filters_module()

Reset filters for the specified datasets

resolve_teal_args()

Handles teal arguments that are only available through delayed loading

srv_add_filter_variable()

Server function to add a filter variable to datasets

set_single_filter_state()

Set the filter state for a single variable

srv_filter_items()

Server function to display filters for a dataset

srv_filter_panel()

Server function for filter panel

srv_filtered_data_overview()

Server function to display the number of patients in the filtered and unfiltered data

srv_nested_tabs()

Server function that returns currently active module

srv_shiny_module_arguments()

Function to inherit Shiny module arguments that must always be present

srv_single_filter_item()

Server function to filter for a single variable

srv_tabs_with_filters()

Server function

srv_teal()

Server function corresponding to teal

srv_teal_with_splash()

Server function that loads the data through reactive loading and then delegates to \link{srv_teal}.

text_to_call()

Create call from string

trigger_after_first_cycle()

Activates the reactive expression after the first reactive flush of Shiny, This is useful when the UI does not exist yet and we want to wait for it Note that this triggers the first time due to the timer and from then on due to the expression being evaluated.

ui_add_filter_variable()

UI to select among the column names of a dataset to add as a filter variable

ui_filter_items()

Creates UI to show currently selected filters that can be applied to a single dataset, i.e. all columns selected for filtering are shown.

ui_filter_panel()

Module for the right filter panel in the teal app with a filter overview panel and a filter variable panel.

ui_filtered_data_overview()

Creates the UI for the module showing counts for each dataset contrasting the filtered to the full unfiltered dataset

ui_nested_tabs()

Create a UI of nested tabs of teal_modules

ui_single_filter_item()

UI to filter a single filter variable

ui_tabs_with_filters()

Add right filter panel into each of the top-level `teal_modules` UIs.

ui_teal()

Teal app UI

ui_teal_with_splash()

UI to show a splash screen in the beginning, then delegate to \link{srv_teal}

variable_type_icons()

Get icons to represent variable types in dataset

variable_types()

Get classes selected columns from dataset
